entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #installer-102457-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #11587
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #installer-102496-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #11584
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main installer, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #installer-102513-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #11581
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main installer, .NET 5 SDK 5.0.4xx, validation-installer-.NET 5 SDK 5.0.4xx #installer-101408-.NET5SDK5.0.4xx #11496
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-installer-.NET 6, installer #installer-101557-.NET6 #11497
    Area-Infrastructure
  • .NET SDK 5.0.400 installer does not include Windows Desktop on ARM64 #11481

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/sdk #11574
  • Update instructions for installing nightly DEB #11568

Merged

  • Add IncludeWorkloadManifest file #11571
  • Fix condition to execute finalizer #11575
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/sdk #11577
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/sdk #11576
  • Removing 7.0 for now as there aren't builds yet. #11573
  • Update Versions.props for RC2 branding #11567
    Branding
  • Remove 5.0.3xx and preview 7 #11572
  • [ArPow] Add runtime repo to tarball #11506
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #11570
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/sdk #11569
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/sdk #11565

Updated

  • [ArPow] Add installer repo to tarball #11483
  • [ArPow Tarball] Tier 3 - Add roslyn-analyzers repo to arpow tarball #11114
  • [ArPow] Add NuGet.Client #11489
